question: How can Muslims be safe from Yajuj and Majuj? What can we do to protect ourselves?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Yajuj and Majuj will emerge at that time when Eesa (Alayhis salaam) will be
leading the Muslims. Almighty Allah Ta'ala will protect Eesa (Alayhis
salaam) and the Muslims.

In order to save ourselves from any Fitna, we should be firm in our faith
and follow the orders of Allah Ta'ala in every walk of our lives.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
